frontMatter.taxonomy.tags.description: Specifies the tags which can be used in the Front Matter

frontMatter.taxonomy.categories.description: Specifies the categories which can be used in the Front Matter

frontMatter.taxonomy.addCreatedIfEmptyOn.markdownDescription: Specify to add created time automatically on save if it's empty. Default: false

frontMatter.taxonomy.updateModifiedOnSav.markdownDescription: Specify to update modified time automatically on save. Default: false

frontMatter.taxonomy.dateFormat.markdownDescription: Specify the datetime format for your articles. Check [date-fns formating](https://date-fns.org/v2.0.1/docs/format) for more information.

frontMatter.taxonomy.slugPrefix.markdownDescription: Specify a prefix for the slug

frontMatter.taxonomy.slugSuffix.markdownDescription: Specify a suffix for the slug

frontMatter.taxonomy.indentArrays.markdownDescription: Specify if arrays in front matter are indented. Default: true.

frontMatter.taxonomy.noPropertyValueQuot.markdownDescription: Specify the properties from which quotes need to be removed.

enumDescriptions: Specifies you want to use YAML markup for the front matter (default)
Specifies you want to use TOML markup for the front matter

frontMatter.taxonomy.filenamePattern.markdownDescription: Specify targeted filename pattern as regex. For example, `.*\.md$` is for markdown files which ends with `.md`. Default: `.*`(all files)
